page.title: 20HOUSING
page.content: Dunfermline has lost a large amount of farmland recently due to the building of new houses. These houses are usually built with brick and breeze block compared with the Victorian stone houses in the older parts of the town. Also, it takes very little time to build these modern houses because of mechanisation and prefabrication. People in Dunfermline expect more from their houses nowadays. They expect them to be spacious and attractive on the outside as well as the inside. There is a lot of sheltered housing being built in Dunfermline. These are flats for the elderly or disabled. There is usually a warden available in case of difficulties.
